original_text: Joseph found favor in his eyes and became his attendant. Potiphar put him in charge of his household, and he entrusted to his care everything he owned.
korean_text: 요셉이 그의 주인에게 은혜를 입어 섬기매 그가 요셉을 가정 총무로 삼고 자기의 소유를 다 그의 손에 위탁하니

sentences.original_text: Joseph found favor in his eyes
Potiphar put him in charge of his household
and he entrusted to his care everything he owned
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 소유한 모든 것을 그에게 맡겼다
